rukus.text: 54|24|atahpara tara balechila, ‘amara ki amadera'i eka byaktira anusarana karaba? Tabe to amara pathabhrastataya ebam unmattataya patita haba.
54|25|‘Amadera madhye ki tara'i prati yikara [1] pathano hayeche? Na, se to ekajana mithyabadi, dambhika [2].’
54|26|Agami kala ora abasya'i janabe, ke mithyabadi, dambhika.
54|27|Niscaya amara tadera pariksara jan'ya ustri pathiyechi, ata'eba apani tadera acarana laksya karuna ebam dhairyasila hona.
54|28|Ara taderake janiye dina ye, tadera madhye pani bantana nirdharita ebam panira ansera jan'ya pratyeke upasthita habe palakrame.
54|29|Atahpara tara tadera sangike dakala, phale se setake (ustri) dhare hatya karala.
54|30|Ata'eba kirupa kathora chila amara sasti o bhitipradarsana
54|31|niscaya amara tadera upara pathiyechilama eka birata a'oyaja; phale tara haye gela khoyara prastutakarira bikhandita sulka kharera n'yaya [1].
54|32|Ara abasya'i amara kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi upadesa grahanera jan'ya; ata'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
54|34|niscaya amara tadera upara pathiyechilama pathara bahanakari pracanda jhatika, kintu luta paribarera upara naya; taderake amara ud'dhara karechilama ratera sesanse
54|35|amadera paksa theke anugrahasbarupa; ye krtajnata prakasa kare, amara ebhabe'i take puraskrta kare thaki.
54|36|Ara abasya'i luta taderake satarka karechila amadera kathora pakara'o samparke; kintu tara satarkabani sambandhe bitanda [1] suru karala.

54|37|Ara abasya'i tara lutera kacha theke tara mehamanaderake asaduddesye dabi karala [1], takhana amara tadera drsti sakti lopa kare dilama ebam balalama, ‘asbadana kara amara sasti ebam bhitira parinama.
54|38|Ara abasya'i pratyuse tadera upara biramahina sasti aghata karechila.
54|39|Sutaram ‘asbadana kara amara sasti ebam bhitipradarsanera parinama.’
